name: Diorma
description:
After a series of unfortunate events, Alice is given the opportunity to explore her psyche through a series of flashbacks with those she has wronged.

Guide her through her adventure by solving puzzles and dictating what choices she makes.

Will Alice Change her path, or will she become something... or someone else?

Inspired by the first video game I played on my psp "Corpse Party", I present "Diorma", a hybrid between Visual Novel and Adventure Game. Where you must solve some puzzles to progress in the story and take care of your decisions to reach the different endings.

I hope you enjoy it!!!! thanks for playing.

Features:

- Visual novel style story

- Puzzles

- Two different endings

- Exploration

Controls:

- Arrow Keys:  Move Character 

-  X Key:  Open Item Menu, Cancel 

- Enter Key: Talk, Check, Confirm

This game was created for the 4th annual Spooktober Visual Novel Jam! within a period of one month.

The game is complete, however a plus version will be worked very soon.

Bugs Reported:

-  Is not a Bug, but there has been some confusion regarding the number of stars that the cancer constellation represents for a game puzzle, because some media say that the constellation is made up of 5 stars and others say that it is 6, for the diorma game we take of reference that the constellation of cancer has 6 stars, being these, for the resolution of the puzzle.

(in the future this image will be replaced in the game by a more understandable one for the resolution of the puzzle).
